verses.text: Then \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Moriah|strong="H4179"\w*, where \add the \+nd Lord\+nd*\add* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* in the \w threshingfloor|strong="H1637"\w* of \w Ornan|strong="H0771"\w* the \w Jebusite|strong="H2983"\w*.\f + \fr 3.1 \ft where…: or, which was seen of David his father\f*\f + \fr 3.1 \ft Ornan: also called, Araunah\f*

And he \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \add day\add* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w fourth|strong="H0702"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of his \w reign|strong="H4438"\w*.

¶ Now these \add are the things wherein\add* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* was \w instructed|strong="H3245"\w* for the \w building|strong="H1129"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. The \w length|strong="H0753"\w* by \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* after the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w measure|strong="H4060"\w* \add was\add* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.\f + \fr 3.3 \ft instructed: Heb. founded\f*

And the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* that \add was\add* in the \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \add of the house\add*, the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \add of it was\add* according to the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \add was\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*: and he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* it \w within|strong="H6441"\w* with \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And the \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* he \w cieled|strong="H2645"\w* with \w fir|strong="H1265"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, which he \w overlaid|strong="H2645"\w* with \w fine|strong="H2896"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5927"\w* thereon palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w* and \w chains|strong="H8333"\w*.

And he \w garnished|strong="H6823"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* for \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w*: and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \add was\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of \w Parvaim|strong="H6516"\w*.\f + \fr 3.6 \ft garnished: Heb. covered\f*

He \w overlaid|strong="H2645"\w* also the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w beams|strong="H6982"\w*, the \w posts|strong="H5592"\w*, and the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* thereof, and the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* thereof, with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*; and \w graved|strong="H6605"\w* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* on the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* whereof \add was\add* according \w to|strong="H6440"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: and he \w overlaid|strong="H2645"\w* it with \w fine|strong="H2896"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add amounting\add* to \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*.

And the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of the \w nails|strong="H4548"\w* \add was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*. And he \w overlaid|strong="H2645"\w* the upper \w chambers|strong="H5944"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And in the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* of \w image|strong="H6816"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.\f + \fr 3.10 \ft image…: or, (as some think) of moveable work\f*

¶ And the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* \add of the one cherub was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w reaching|strong="H5060"\w* to the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and the \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* \add was likewise\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w reaching|strong="H5060"\w* to the \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*.

And \add one\add* \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w reaching|strong="H5060"\w* to the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and the \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add also\add*, \w joining|strong="H1695"\w* to the \w wing|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*.

The \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of these \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* spread themselves \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: and they \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* on their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \add were\add* \w inward|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft inward: or, toward the house\f*

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w crimson|strong="H3758"\w*, and fine \w linen|strong="H0948"\w*, and \w wrought|strong="H5927"\w* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* thereon.\f + \fr 3.14 \ft wrought: Heb. caused to ascend\f*

Also he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H0753"\w*, and the \w chapiter|strong="H6858"\w* that \add was\add* on the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of each of them \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.\f + \fr 3.15 \ft high: Heb. long\f*

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w chains|strong="H8333"\w*, \add as\add* in the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* on the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*; and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* on the \w chains|strong="H8333"\w*.

And he reared \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* on the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* on the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*; and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of that on the right \w hand|strong="H3233"\w* \w Jachin|strong="H3199"\w*, and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of that on the \w left|strong="H8042"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft Jachin: that is, He shall establish\f*\f + \fr 3.17 \ft Boaz: that is, In it is strength\f*
